mapper.select: select '1' type,IFNULL(SUM(request_data),0) total from channel_data where DATE(record_time)= CURDATE() UNION ALL select '2' type,IFNULL(count(1),0) total from game_trigger where type=2 and DATE(create_time)= CURDATE() UNION ALL select '3' type,IFNULL(count(1),0) total from game_trigger where type=3 and DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()

select.if: SELECT '1' type,DATE_FORMAT(record_time,'%Y-%m-%d') days,IFNULL(SUM(request_data),0) total FROM channel_data where DATE(record_time) between #{dto.startDate} and #{dto.endDate} GROUP BY days
SELECT '2' type,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') days,IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) total FROM game_trigger where type=2 and DATE(create_time) between #{dto.startDate} and #{dto.endDate} GROUP BY days
SELECT '3' type,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') days,IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) total FROM game_trigger where type=3 and DATE(create_time) between #{dto.startDate} and #{dto.endDate} GROUP BY days

mapper.select: select t1.*, rank() over(ORDER BY download_num desc ) as 'rank' from ( SELECT t.*, (select IFNULL(sum(request_data),0) from channel_data cd where cd.game_id =t.id) request_num, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from game_trigger gtr where gtr.game_id =t.id and gtr.type=2) download_num, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from game_trigger gtr where gtr.game_id =t.id and gtr.type=3) open_num from (select g.id,g.game_name,l.language_name,gt.type_name from game g LEFT join language l on l.id=g.language_id LEFT JOIN game_type gt on gt.id=g.game_type ) t )t1
